title: Friday’s best deals: iPhone 11/Pro/Max $829 refurb discounts, Belkin MagSafe charger, more
content:
Heading into the weekend, all of today’s best deals are now headlined by up to $829 in refurbished discounts on iPhone 11/Pro/Max models. That’s alongside the Roku Streaming Stick 4K+ with AirPlay 2 down at $49 and the second discount on Belkin’s latest MagSafe Car Charger. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Friday’s best deals: iPhone 11/Pro/Max $829 refurb discounts, Belkin MagSafe charger, more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Today at Woot, you can lock-in a iPhone 11 refurb discount that's taking up to $829 off select handsets plus Belkin MagSafe gear and more.
